column4: My program has a generated a table of strings arranged in rows and columns. Is there some Ubuntu package that will print this table nicely? Ideally, something in Postscript or PDF with lines separating the columns and separating every fith row.
You could always use OpenOffice as a spreadsheet and import it that way and see if that works for you.
ok, thanks ... was that supposed to be obvious
Lol, no just pointing out an obvious solution.
